task.title: Cleanup - Kitchen Staff
task.shortdesc: This is the cleaning procedure kitchen staff should follow as part of the closing procedure.

context.p: All cleanup items should be completed as part of the closing procedure. See "Closing Procedure" for more information.

step.cmd: Turn off the fryer, the oven, and any active burners.
step.info: No food prep requiring heat should be completed at this time.

step.cmd: Return all food items and clean cooking equipment to their original storage areas.
Prepare a list of items for what will need to be prepared in the morning, before the restaurant opens.

substep.cmd: Post this list on the bulletin board in dry storage.
Wash all counters with a wash cloth and Natural A solution.
For metal surfaces, use a dry rag and the special cleaning solution for metal. This will impart a shine to these metal surfaces.

step.cmd: If there are items to be left out overnight, ensure that they are placed in a safe location where they will not be knocked over, bumped, or spilled. No heating or cooking equipment should be left on overnight.
